strong.span: Sulphur Bluff ISD Updates on School Closures and Covid-19

p.style: font-stretch: normal; font-family: Montserrat, sans-serif; text-align: center;

span.b: SBISD will remain closed through the 2019-2020 School Year

p.style: font-stretch: normal; font-size: 12px; font-family: Montserrat, sans-serif; text-align: center;

span.span: SBISD will offer school meals free for the duration of our closure. Pick up at the school or deliveries can be made. Contact the school at 903-945-9303 or complete our online survey at

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: arial, sans-serif; text-align: center;

div.class: col-md-12 thumbnail wow animated wow animated pulse

div.div: We love this guy!! Eli is an officer in FFA and Beta, top five in his class, and competed in the state tournament for golf last year. One of the nicest guys in the whole class!Eli will be at[...] . . .

div.class: col-md-12 thumbnail wow animated wow animated pulse

img.alt: UIL Cancels All Spring Activities and State Championships

div.h3: UIL Cancels All Spring Activities and State Championships
div.div: UIL has cancelled all remaining spring activities and state championships. Practices, rehearsals, and workouts remain suspended until further notice. . . .

a.aria-label: Full Article For UIL Cancels All Spring Activities and State Championships
Source Information For UIL Cancels All Spring Activities and State Championships

div.class: col-md-12 thumbnail wow animated wow animated pulse

img.alt: Schools in Texas are Closed for Remainder of the Year

div.h3: Schools in Texas are Closed for Remainder of the Year
div.div: Governor Abbott has signed an Executive Order closing schools for the rest of the school year. We will still be sending home lessons from teachers and school lunches until our our original [...] . . .

a.aria-label: Full Article For Schools in Texas are Closed for Remainder of the Year
Source Information For Schools in Texas are Closed for Remainder of the Year

div.class: col-md-12 thumbnail wow animated wow animated pulse

div.div: Sulphur Bluff ISD will be picking assignments up and dropping assignments off on Monday’s. That will give each student a full week to try and complete assignments. The school will be open [...] . . .

img.alt: Covid-19 Information - Apart We Stand Together

div.h3: Covid-19 Information - Apart We Stand Together
div.div: Head to http://tea.texas.gov/staywell for vitally important public health guidance to stop the spread. If we stand apart as a community now, we will be together again soon. . . .

a.aria-label: Full Article For Covid-19 Information - Apart We Stand Together
Source Information For Covid-19 Information - Apart We Stand Together
